g.text: Real-time messaging • State synchronization • Event coordination • Error propagation
Redis/RabbitMQ • WebSocket connections • Async message queues
24/7 autonomous operation • Sub-second agent responses • Parallel processing • Continuous deployment • No human wait times
Total Team Size: 8 People (Minimal Human Oversight)
• 24/7 autonomous agent operation • Human oversight for strategic decisions • Exception handling & escalation management
• Agent performance optimization • Quality gate supervision • Business alignment validation • Infrastructure monitoring
• Cost & resource management • Security compliance oversight • Continuous system improvement • Agent coordination protocols
Agentic AI Workflow Strengths and Weaknesses
